The claim states that Principal Muhammad: Salad implemented a Halal menu at an elementary school in West Virginia.
The expert: s verdict confirms that a principal named Muhammad Al-Salad does not exist and that the man featured in the meme is actually Jesse Morton, a former Al Qaeda recruiter.
Jesse Morton: now working for an anti-extremism think tank, is conducting research on the ideology he once spread and aims to deter individuals from extremist groups.
In addition to the fictional principal: there is no record of a Pratchett-Kline Elementary School in Bluefield, West Virginia, indicating that the claim is likely fake news spread for satirical purposes.
